text: The 60th Tour of Austria in 2008 Victory podium at the 2009 Tour of Austria Riccardo Riccò, winner at the 2010 Tour of Austria The Tour of Austria () is a stage cycling race held in Austria. From 1949 to 1995 it was a race for amateur cyclists, turning into a professional event in 1996. In 2005 and 2006 it was organised as a 2.1 event on the UCI Europe Tour, becoming a 2.HC event in 2007. The race will become part of the new UCI ProSeries in 2020. Since 2005 it has usually been held in July. Before that, it was seen as an ideal preparation race for the Tour de France. ==Winners== ==External links== * Category:UCI Europe Tour races Category:Cycle races in Austria Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1949 Category:1949 establishments in Austria
title: Tour of Austria
